source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW pins_position_grouped

    AS

SELECT 

    Position  AS PositionCode,
    First(Position_1)  AS Description

    
FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr
WHERE Position IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY Position ;

# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (sap hr) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.position_dim)
- **New Data:** where a Loc in the source does not exist as a LocationCode in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Loc in source and LocationCode in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an LocationCode in the target exists but the same Loc doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View PINS_Location_dim_new is created

%%sql
-- Build PINS_Location_dim_new table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW position_dim_new

     AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT 
    CASE
        WHEN T1.PositionCode IS NULL
        THEN T7.PositionCode
        ELSE NULL
    END as PositionID, 
    T1.PositionCode,
    T1.Description,
    T2.SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS StartDate,
    NULL AS EndDate,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.PositionCode,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Description,'.'))) as RowID,
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.PositionCode = T7.PositionCode AND  md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.PositionCode,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Description,'.'))) <> T7.RowID   -- same employee, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T7.PositionCode IS NULL -- new employee
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.PositionCode IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData

FROM pins_position_grouped T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "SAP HR" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.position_dim T7 ON T1.PositionCode = T7.PositionCode
WHERE  (T7.IsActive = 'Y' or T7.IsActive IS NULL)
    
        AND (
        
        -- flags new data        
        (   CASE
                WHEN T1.PositionCode = T7.PositionCode AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.PositionCode,'.'), IFNULL(T1.Description,'.'))) <> T7.RowID  -- same employee, changed data
                THEN 'Y'
                WHEN T7.PositionCode IS NULL -- new employee
                THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
            END  = 'Y' ) OR
        
        -- flags deleted data
        (   CASE
                WHEN T1.PositionCode IS NULL
                THEN 'Y'
                ELSE 'N'
            END = 'Y' )
)

;

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **PINS_Location_dim__new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View PINS_Location_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW position_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 
    PositionID,
    PositionCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive

From position_dim_new

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    PositionID,
    PositionCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.position_dim
WHERE PositionCode IN (SELECT PositionCode FROM position_dim_new);

# View PINS_Location_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. LocationID from PINS_Location_dim), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.organisationunit_dim is updated

%%sql

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.position_dim AS Target
USING position_dim_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.PositionID = Target.PositionID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.EndDate = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.PINS_Location_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new PINS_Location_dim

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.position_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY PositionID NULLS LAST) AS PositionID,
    PositionCode,
    Description,
    SourceSystemID,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.position_dim;
